column5: na mobɔtwe m’afona efi no bɔha no mu

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ mubotwa atseneneefo na emumuyɛfo nyina efi wo mu ntsi na mobɔtwe m’afona efi no bɔha mu no
column3: wɔ adasa nyina do ofi pomu afamu kesi kwaamu afamu;"

column2: "na adasa nyina bohu dɛ emi EWURADZE na matwe m’afona efi no bɔha mu; ɔrennsan nnkɔ mu bio."

column2: "wɔasew ano ama oeekuku; wɔapɔw ho ma ɔaayɛ dɛ enyinam: Yebesi dɛn ama hɛn ho asɛpɛw hɛn? Ebu abaa no enyimtsia
column3: na enyidzi nyina."
ama wɔdze nsa eesuo mu; afona no
Keka mu na bɔ mbubuw: na ɔreba me man na Israel mbapɔmba nyinara do: woeyi hɔn nye me man ama afona: Ao
column4: fa wo nsa hwe wo bo do ae!"

column2: "Na hwɛ; na sɛ abaa no a obu enyimtsia no mpo nnyi hɔ bio so ɛ? EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column5: na bɔ wo nsamu; na ma afona no mbra mprɛnu
column7: afona a wɔdze dzi ewu a. Afona a odzi ewu kɛse a etwa hom ho nyina ehyia."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hɔn akoma etutu na hɔn a wofintsiw adɔɔ so. Medze afona no n’ano esisi hɔn mbobokɛse nyina ano
column3: Aa! Wɔayɛ no dɛ enyinam; wɔasew ano dze ruboku."
kɔ bankum; mbrɛ w’enyi besi biara."

column2: "Mo so mobɔbɔ me nsamu na mama m’ebufuhyew adwe: emi EWURADZE na maka."

column2: "Jerusalɛm ho mbusu nkɔnhyɛ dze ne nsa nyimfa mu
column3: dɛ wɔmfa afasubu ndadzefir nsisi
column4: dɛ wombue ano wɔ oku mu

column6: dɛ wɔmfa afasubu ndadzefir a wobesisi mbobokɛse no nsisi

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbusu nkɔnhyɛ gyangyan wɔ hɔn enyi do
column3: ama hɔn a wɔaka ntam egu hɔn do no: na ɔnodze
column4: ɔma wɔkaa hɔn emumuyɛ ama wɔaakyer hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ hom ayɛ ma wɔakaa hom emumuyɛ
column3: wɔ dɛ hom mbrato ada edzi
column4: na hom bɔn yi noho wɔ hom nyɛe nyinara mu ntsi; osiandɛ hom aba nkaa mu ntsi

column3: omumuyɛnyi otsiɔdzennyi Israelhen ɔwo a wo da edu
column4: ewiei no no mbusu ber no a;"

column2: "mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hom nyi akyekyertsir no
column3: na hom mpɔr ahembɔtsir no: ndzɛmba nnkɛyɛ dɛm daa. Ma dza ɔbrɛ adze no do
column4: na brɛ dza ɔkrɔn no adze."

column2: "Ma ɔnsan nkɛhyɛ no bɔha mu! Beebi mbrɛ wɔbɔɔ wo no
column3: asaase a wɔwoo wo wɔ do no

column2: "Na mubohue m’ebufuhyew egu wo do; medze m’ebufuw ne gya no mubohuw egu wo do: na mibeyi wo ahyɛ mbarimba etsirmɔdzenfo a wɔawea adzesɛɛ ho hɔn nsa."
"Ebɛyɛ nyena ama gya no; wo bɔgyaa bogu asaase no finimfin; wɔrennkaa wo bio: na emi EWURADZE na maka."
